Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Best Western Hotel Toubkal, you'll be centrally located in Casablanca, steps from Complex Cultural Sidi Belyout and minutes from United Nations Square. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Central Market of Casablanca and Chleuh Mosque.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 67 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a nightclub, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Best Western Hotel Toubkal. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and express check-in. Free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 1 PM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Best Western Hotel Toubkal. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a nightclub, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

With a stay at Best Western Hotel Toubkal, you'll be centrally located in Casablanca, steps from Complex Cultural Sidi Belyout and minutes from United Nations Square. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Central Market of Casablanca and Chleuh Mosque.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Complex Cultural Sidi Belyout - 0.1 km / 0 mi
United Nations Square - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Central Market of Casablanca - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Chleuh Mosque - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Place Mohammed V - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Parc de la Ligue Arabe - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Marina Casablanca - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Port of Casablanca - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Cathedrale Sacre Coeur - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Casablanca Twin Center - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Hassan II Mosque - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Stade Mohammed V - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Casablanca Technopark - 6.6 km / 4.1 mi
Hassan II University - 7.3 km / 4.5 mi
Morocco Mall - 8.8 km / 5.5 mi

The preferred airport for Best Western Hotel Toubkal is Casablanca (CMN-Mohammed V) - 25.5 km / 15.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
